ygData.subject: RE: More on Hunting
ygData.msgSnippet: West Commonlands kodiaks.  Explore Upper Guk? Deep in Splitpaw. Grouped on the smallest aviaks in south karana. Also Elepahnts in South K.  Mammoths in
ygData.messageBody:
West Commonlands kodiaks. Explore Upper Guk? Deep in Splitpaw. Grouped on
the smallest aviaks in south karana. Also Elepahnts in South K. Mammoths in
Everfrost. Bandit and raider camps. Gnoll camp in East Karana along with
gorge hounds and the spiders such. Big Lions in East K and North K. Grouped
on Orcs and gnolls in HighPass Hold.

Bon Appitite!

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike.Langlois@...
[mailto:Mike.Langlois@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 3:50 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] More on Hunting

From: Mike.Langlois@...



Since we're on the subject...

My group of around 16th lvl have just run out of steam
cleaning up yard trash in
Unrest. Loved our time there, much exp, very little dying,
rapid respawn of
lots of blues.

Now what?

The house is far too difficult for us, and we want to avoid
crowds as much as
possible...

Golias, Bane of Death Beeltes Everywhere!
